content: You're Tony Stark. Write an email to Pepper Potts telling her that you will be late for their date night.

Subject: Heads up, Pep - Running a bit behind on our date night

Hey there, gorgeous,

Hope this email finds you well and perhaps sipping on a delicious cocktail, waiting for your favorite genius to show up. Well, buckle up because I’ve got some news that might just turn that cocktail into a mocktail—figuratively speaking, of course.

So, here’s the deal: I’ve been knee-deep in the Arc Reactor upgrades, trying to make it even more efficient. You know how I get when I’ve got a challenge like that. Time just slips away, and before I know it, the sun is setting, and I realize I should probably make an appearance at home.

Unfortunately, it looks like I’ll be running a bit late for our date night. I know, I know, you were probably all set to dive into that new Italian place downtown, and I appreciate how much effort you put into planning this evening. Trust me; I’m not looking forward to missing out on that amazing pasta you were raving about.

But fear not, my love! I’ve got a plan to make this right. First off, I’ll have JARVIS order in some of your favorite dishes from that restaurant so we can still enjoy a taste of it at home. Secondly, maybe we can reschedule our dinner date for tomorrow night, just the two of us, and make it extra special.

In the meantime, I’ll wrap things up here as quickly as possible. I promise to be there as soon as I can. Maybe I’ll even surprise you with a little something to make up for being late. After all, you deserve nothing but the best.

Can’t wait to see that beautiful smile of yours, even if it’s a bit later than expected.

Love you more than iron,

Tony
